Package com.infragistics.reveal.sdk.api

Interface IRVDataSourceProvider

public interface IRVDataSourceProvider
The interface that must be implemented to replace data sources when a dashboard is opened. It must be passed to Reveal Engine initialization. See 'Replacing data sources' in the developer guide for more information.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    RVDataSourceItem changeDashboardFilterDataSourceItem​(String userId, String dashboardId, RVDashboardFilter filter, RVDataSourceItem dataSourceItem)
    This method can be used to replace the data source used by a given filter, returning null indicates Reveal to use the original data source stored in the dashboard.
    RVDataSourceItem changeVisualizationDataSourceItem​(String userId, String dashboardId, RVVisualization visualization, RVDataSourceItem dataSourceItem)
    This method can be used to replace the data source used by a given visualization, returning null indicates Reveal to use the original data source stored in the dashboard.

  • Method Details

    • changeVisualizationDataSourceItem

      RVDataSourceItem changeVisualizationDataSourceItem​(String userId, String dashboardId, RVVisualization visualization, RVDataSourceItem dataSourceItem)
      This method can be used to replace the data source used by a given visualization, returning null indicates Reveal to use the original data source stored in the dashboard.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user requesting data, as returned by IRVUserContextProvider.getUserId().
      dashboardId - The ID of the dashboard being loaded.
      visualization - The visualization to change the data source for, you might use the Title attribute to decide the data source to use.
      dataSourceItem - The data source item referencing the data source currently used by the visualization, like the name of the table, database, etc.
      Returns:
      A new data source item for the visualization, or null if the data source shouldn't be changed for this visualization.

    • changeDashboardFilterDataSourceItem

      RVDataSourceItem changeDashboardFilterDataSourceItem​(String userId, String dashboardId, RVDashboardFilter filter, RVDataSourceItem dataSourceItem)
      This method can be used to replace the data source used by a given filter, returning null indicates Reveal to use the original data source stored in the dashboard.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user requesting data, as returned by IRVUserContextProvider.getUserId().
      dashboardId - The ID of the dashboard being loaded.
      filter - The filter where the data source is being referenced, you might use the Title attribute to decide the data source to use
      dataSourceItem - Information about the data source being used, like the name of the table, database, etc.
      Returns:
      The new data source to use or null to use the original data source in the dashboard.
